pages.text: Yep, it's time for another update. This time it's mostly bugfixes and a few recipe tweaks. Thanks again to Fwengum on my discord for reporting most of them. This should also mark the last update before I really start working on 2.3.0, with the exception of one last bugfix update before that,

if something new comes up. Once 2.3.0 is published I'm basically done with the pack except more balance tweaks and bug fixes as I already have more then enough projects that need my attention. So it will be a great feeling to have something 'finished' for the most part.
And who knows maybe there will be a day, where I have enough time to start working on the successor of <zerblands>. Anyway have a nice day and thank you for playing something I created. :)
